action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Fix project creation API datetime serialization issue and create sample projects with timeline tasks. The timeline zoom functionality cannot be tested without project data. Specific fixes needed: 1) Fix datetime.date serialization in project creation endpoint, 2) Create demo projects with tasks and dependencies, 3) Ensure timeline API endpoints return proper data structure for Gantt chart rendering.
